parameters.name: SourceImageType
parameters.description:
Type of Image 1, with values:

- **FacePic**: User's face photo
- **IDPic**: Headshot from the user's second-generation ID card chip (typically obtained and decoded by a second-generation ID card reader)

parameters.name: SourceImageValue
parameters.description: Address of Image 1. Please refer to the instructions on uploading image addresses.

parameters.name: TargetImageType
parameters.description:
Type of Image 2, with values:

- **FacePic**: User's face photo
- **IDPic**: Headshot from the user's second-generation ID card chip (typically obtained and decoded by a second-generation ID card reader)

parameters.name: TargetImageValue
parameters.description: Address of Image 2. Please refer to the instructions on uploading image addresses.
